title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 4th house for Scorpio Ascendant, home, emotional security, and inner peace undergo unusual shifts. This phase can bring restlessness at home, sudden changes in residence, or unconventional property matters. Emotional satisfaction may feel elusive, pushing you to redefine comfort on your own terms. Career ambitions can overshadow domestic priorities. Grounding routines and clarity in family matters are essential. Used consciously, this transit supports innovative living arrangements and new definitions of emotional stability.

sections.title: Career
points: Career focus intrudes into personal space
Unconventional career choices influence home life

sections.title: Finance
points: Sudden expenses related to home or property
Speculative real estate decisions need caution

closing: This Rahu transit challenges traditional comfort to create new emotional foundations. With grounding and clarity, it enables flexible and self-defined stability.
